name: Better Built Aluminum Arched Loading Ramps (2-Pack) - 750 lb.
description: The Better Built Aluminum Solid Arched Loading Ramps (2-Pack) feature an adjustable safety strap to fit your vehicle, and each ramp supports up to 750 lb. evenly distributed. It's ideal for easy loading and unloading of lawn tractors and other equipment.Ideal for loading and unloading lawn tractors and other equipmentRugged aluminum construction750 lb. evenly-distributed weight capacity per rampHeavy-duty mono threshold bar for stability and strengthResists rustSafety strap adjusts to fit your vehicleEach ramp weights only 20 lb.Note: Product may vary by store.
